text: Meantime is a 1983 British comedy-drama movie directed by Mike Leigh and starring Marion Bailey, Phil Daniels, Tim Roth, Pam Ferris, Alfred Molina, Gary Oldman, Tilly Vosburgh, Herbert Norville. ==Other websites== * Category:1983 comedy-drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Mike Leigh
title: Meantime (movie)
